name: Ortalsoft
tag_list: web-design, web-development, e-commerce, internet-marketing, custom-websites, web-applications, web-maintenance, website-redesign, logo-design, custom-softwares, shopping-cart, seo, pay-per-click, content-management
overview:
At OrtalSoft, our design team is constantly researching to keep up to the latest web trends and to keep out work on the fore-fronts. When you work with us, we promise to provide you with a remarkable website that will touch the soul and heart of your business with enchanting your customers.

We make sure that we completely understand the requirements of your website by dedicating ample amount of time so that we can make your website a success with complete satisfaction, making sure that we get the right massage out about your business.

The features of the website will be:

• A clean and user-friendly interface • Relevant and focused information • Easy-to-read content layouts • Cross-browser compatibility • Intuitive navigation • Use of the most current web standards and practices

We create third party software for you or integrate commonly existing third party software to your website. We discuss the details of the customization for your website and make recommendations that best suits your website. Contact our marketing team to discuss further.

Our goal is to provide you with complete satisfaction and complete solution to all your web related needs:

• Content Creation • Copy editing • Logo Creation • Custom Flash or JavaScript Animations • Search Engine Marketing • Content Management Solutions • Social Media Marketing • eCommerce Development • Hosting • Website Maintenance
